"هوذا العذراء تحبل و تلد ابنا" الايه دي موجودة فين ؟؟ (متي – اشعياء)

"Those who hate me without cause wink the eye." (Psalms 35:19)
"Behold, the virgin will become pregnant and will give birth to a son." - In which books can this verse be located? (Matthew – Isaiah)
"And you, Bethlehem Ephrathah, although you are among the smallest of the clans of Judah, from you will come forth for me one who will rule over Israel." (Matthew – Micah)
Old Testament
Secondly, Direct Quotations:
The ancient Church Fathers made extensive quotations from the Old Testament
Even Apostles quoted a lot from the Old Testament
The works of Philo the Jewish from around 20 BC
Writings by Trypho, the Jewish, first century
Writings by Josephus, the Jewish, first century
• New Testament Citations
• The Book of the Church Fathers from the first and second centuries contain 32,000 quotations.
• Nearly all of the New Testament, except for 11 verses
